dialogue4.0.phrases1: You can only attack hand-to-hand if there is no one between you and the target. Fighters already out of action don't count. \n\nWould you like to know more?

dialogue5.0.phrases1: You can't attack in the first turn either because the enemy is not close enough to get an axe hit. Take advantage of this moment to position yourself in the right place or to put yourself on the defensive.\n\nWould you like to know more?
